msbt.message: Well, well If it isn't young ! Where were you?I was at your place at the time we agreed and you were nowhere to be found. What gives?!
Hey, uh, you know how we were supposed to meet up at your place? Any chance I could get a rain check? Sorry, kiddo. I forgot that I was supposed to be with someone else.

Aw, fiddlesticks. I know I was supposed to meet up at your place, kiddo. It's just that somethin' came up! It was outta my hands, I swear.Look, I'll make it up to you. Invite me over again and I'll bring you to drink.
